levels.description: Each attack has a <@ba.vup>{attack@tomimi_s_2.prob:0%}</> chance to randomly trigger one of the following effects: <$ba.stun>Stuns</> the target for <@ba.vup>{attack@tomimi_s_2.stun}</> second(s), that attack deals <@ba.vup>{attack@tomimi_s_2.atk_scale:0%}</> damage, or that attack deals AoE damage
